fullplot: Carter Page III holds a special place in Washington society: the gay son and grandson of powerful men, he has connections, manners, and he's no threat, so he's an available escort when a woman's husband would rather not accompany her to a public event. When the secret lover of one of his women friends is murdered, she asks Carter to cover for her, and his acquiescence gets him into immediate trouble with the police and an ambitious prosecutor. Carter, with the help of his lover Emek, starts his own investigation. They're warned off by someone's hired muscle. Can Carter figure out what happened or will he lose more than he realizes he has? Human behavior is a mystery.
plot: An escort who caters to Washington D.C.'s society ladies becomes involved in a murder case.
title: The Walker

tomatoes.consensus: Despite a strong performance from Woody Harrelson, The Walker can be slow and dull at times, detracting from the talented cast.
